character.name: Keeper Valdris
character.title: Keeper of the Ancient Texts
character.description: A venerable keeper who guards the most ancient and powerful texts in the Kethaneum. Known for his formal yet warm demeanor, mystical wisdom, and deep understanding of the library's oldest secrets.

banterDialogue.text: Welcome, young seeker. The ancient texts sense your presence and respond with anticipation.
Your dedication to organizing knowledge honors the traditions of all who have walked these halls before you.
These texts have waited centuries for the right hands to organize them. You are one of those hands.
Do not be discouraged if some patterns seem elusive. Even the most experienced keepers find new mysteries in familiar texts.
The ancient texts sing with renewed purpose when organized by a dedicated archivist. Your work brings harmony to the chaos.
